chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
f: nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_instr (pos (S n))
g: nat -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))
g_app: forall (k i : nat) P Q, g k i (P ++ Q) = g k i P ++ g k (length P + i) Q
g_app_inv: forall (k i : nat) P (l r : list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))), g k i P = l ++ r -> exists L R : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = L ++ R /\ l = g k i L /\ r = g k (length l + i) R
length_g: forall (l i : nat) P, length (g l i P) = length P
g_subcode: forall (k i : nat) P (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (i, P) -> (j, f k j ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P)
subcode_g: forall (k i : nat) P (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n))), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P) -> exists ρ' : mm_instr (pos n), (j, ρ' :: nil) <sc (i, P) /\ ρ = f k j ρ'
g_loops: forall (k i : nat) P, 1 <= i -> i + length P <= k -> mm_no_self_loops (i, g k i P)
P: list (mm_instr (pos n))
R: list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))
sc_R_1: (1 + lP, DECₐ pos0 0 :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R)
sc_R_2: (2 + lP, DECₐ pos0 (1 + (2 + lP)) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R)
R_sc: forall (i : nat) (rho : mm_instr (pos (S n))), (i, rho :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R) -> i = 1 + lP /\ rho = DECₐ pos0 0 \/ i = 2 + lP /\ rho = DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) \/ i = 3 + lP /\ rho = DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP)
R_no_self_loops: mm_no_self_loops (1 + lP, R)
Q: list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))
Q_no_self_loops: mm_no_self_loops (1, Q)
sc_Q_1: forall (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (1, P) -> (j, f (1 + lP) j ρ :: nil) <sc (1, Q)
sc_Q_2: (1 + lP, DECₐ pos0 0 :: DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil) <sc (1, Q)
sc_Q_3: (2 + lP, DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil) <sc (1, Q)
Q_sc: forall (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n))), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (1, Q) -> (exists ρ' : mm_instr (pos n), (j, ρ' :: nil) <sc (1, P) /\ ρ = f (1 + lP) j ρ') \/ j = 1 + lP /\ ρ = DECₐ pos0 0 \/ j = 2 + lP /\ ρ = DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) \/ j = 3 + lP /\ ρ = DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP)
Q_length: length Q = lP + 3
Q_bound: forall (i : nat) (x : pos (S n)) (j : nat), (i, DECₐ x j :: nil) <sc (1, Q) -> j < 1 + length Q
P_imp_Q: forall s s0 : nat * Vector.t nat n, in_code (fst s) (1, P) -> (1, P) // s ~~> s0 -> (1, Q) // (fst s, Vector.cons nat 0 n (snd s)) ↓
Q_imp_P: forall s s0 : nat * Vector.t nat (S n), in_code (fst s) (1, P) -> snd s#>pos0 = 0 -> (1, Q) // s ~~> s0 -> (1, P) // (fst s, vec_tail (snd s)) ↓

Goal:
{Q : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) | mm_no_self_loops (1, Q) /\ (forall (i : nat) (x : pos (S n)) (j : nat), (i, DECₐ x j :: nil) <sc (1, Q) -> j < 1 + length Q) /\ (forall v : Vector.t nat n, (1, P) // (1, v) ↓ <-> (1, Q) // (1, Vector.cons nat 0 n v) ↓)}

VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, vec ?A (l + r) -> vec ?A l * vec ?A r where ?A : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> (1, P) // (fst s, vec_tail (snd s)) ↓ |- Type]

Fin.caseS' : forall (p : pos (S ?n)) (P0 : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P0 pos0 -> (forall p0 : pos ?n, P0 (pos_nxt p0)) -> P0 p where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> (1, P) // (fst s, vec_tail (snd s)) ↓ |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> (1, P) // (fst s, vec_tail (snd s)) ↓ |- nat]
VectorDef.rectS : forall P0 : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P0 0 (a ## vec_nil)) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P0 n0 v -> P0 (S n0) (a ## v)) ->...-> (1, P) // (fst s, vec_tail (snd s)) ↓ |- Type]
mm_self_loop_no_term_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) \/ s = (1 + i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) // s ↓
mm_self_loop_no_term_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) // s ↓
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ~~> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s ~~> se -> Q s
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ->> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s -> > se -> Q s

```coq
exists Q. split.
- exact Q_no_self_loops.
- split.
  + exact Q_bound.
  + intros v. split.
    * intros inP trans. apply (mm_special_ind n P (1, Q)). assumption.
      intros i rho vin j w scR1 scR2. apply (sc_Q_1 j rho v) in scR1.
      destruct scR1 as [rho' [scP rho_eq]].
      apply (subcode_g 1 P j rho) in scP as [rho_sub sc_g].
      rewrite rho_eq. apply (mm_steps_DEC_1_inv n i P 0 (pos0 (S n)) j 0 w v) in scP.
      { destruct scP as [k' [bound_k' trans_step]]. apply Tauto.I with None.
        - apply Tauto.Cj with (i, rho :: nil) (Some (j, w)). assumption.
        - apply Tauto.D with (trans_step). apply Tauto.A with (Q (j, w)). exact trans.
      }
      { discriminate. }
    * intros [step | term].
      { apply P_imp_Q in step; auto. apply Q_imp_P; auto. }
      { apply Q_imp_P in term. apply P_imp_Q; auto. }
Qed.
```
